title: Virtual Reality-Based Classroom Management Skills Training Program

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Training in a 3D virtual space resembling an actual classroom, interacting with AI characters role-playing as students.

learning_goals: Apply classroom atmosphere management techniques while interacting with 30 AI student characters in a virtual classroom (80%+ performance)
Practice five or more strategies to address disruptive behaviors (drowsiness, talking, etc.) by student characters

After completing the simulation, learners will conduct self-assessments in three core areas (e.g., decision-making accuracy, time management, collaboration efficiency) based on the system-generated behavior analysis report, develop at least one specific improvement plan per area, and submit them to the instructional manager.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
